title: 自己开的服，自己进不去！
author: Qiang_chai
txt_content:
server.properties：
#Minecraft server properties
#Wed Aug 03 18:49:59 CST 2016
generator-settings=
op-permission-level=2
allow-nether=false
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
announce-player-achievements=false
server-port=25565
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
force-gamemode=true
level-seed=
server-ip=
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=false
white-list=false
spawn-animals=false
snooper-enabled=false
hardcore=false
online-mode=false
resource-pack=
pvp=true
difficulty=2
server-name=MiniGames Server
enable-command-block=true
player-idle-timeout=0
gamemode=0
max-players=12
spawn-monsters=true
view-distance=10
generate-structures=true
spawn-protection=16
motd=Welcome to the ColorfulBoxGame server\!

replies.author: Qiang_chai
replies.txt_content:
标题: 自己开的服，自己进不去！RT，自己开了个1.7.2的服务器，发现自己进不去，别人还没试过...
连接时服务端上显示：
[Server thread/INFO]: /192.168.1.102:55432 lost connection: Internal Exception: net.minecraft.util.io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: An internal error occured.
不知道是怎么回事，希望有大神解决一下！

replies.author: a66344512
replies.txt_content:
端口映射:
登录设置页面(192.168.1.1/192.168.0.1)
进转发规则
虛拟服务器
添加新条目
   服务端口填 端口号(mc一般是25565)
   ip填內网ip
   协议选all
之后就可以了.

replies.author: Qiang_chai
replies.txt_content:
Bad_Guy 发表于 2016-8-4 03:33
是否开启白名单？
white-list=false
